languages.text: "Странное дело, шерин. Дворец разрушен, а ценности на своих местах. Мы с вами либо первооткрыватели сего места, либо... никто не желал иметь с ним дело".

traits.locale_text: "Странное дело, шерин. Дворец разрушен, а ценности на своих метсах. Мы с вами либо первооткрыватели сего места, либо... никто не желал иметь с ним дело".

languages.text: "How very peculiar, shereen. The palace is ruined, and still all of the valuables are sitting exactly where they should be. Either we are the first to discover this place, or... nobody wanted anything to do with it."
languages.original_text: "Странное дело, шерин. Дворец разрушен, а ценности на своих местах. Мы с вами либо первооткрыватели сего места, либо... никто не желал иметь с ним дело".

traits.locale_text: "How very peculiar, shereen. The palace is ruined, and still all of the valuables are sitting exactly where they should be. Either we are the first to discover this place, or... nobody wanted anything to do with it."

"How very peculiar, shereen. The palace is ruined, but all of the valuables are sitting snugly where they should be. Either we are the first to discover this place, or... nobody wanted to deal with it."

"How very peculiar, shereen. The palace is ruined, and still all of the valuables are sitting exactly where they should be. Either we are the first to discover this place, or... nobody wanted anything to do with it."

"How very peculiar, shereen. The palace is ruined, and still all of the valuables are sitting exactly where they should be. Either we are the first to discover this place, or... nobody wanted anything to do with it."

"How very peculiar, shereen. The palace is ruined, and still all of the valuables are sitting exactly where they should be. Either we are the first to discover this place, or... nobody wanted anything to do with it."

languages.text: 「なんて不気味なのかしら、シャリーン。宮廷は廃墟になってるのに、貴重品はすべてあるべき場所に置かれたまま。あたしたちがこの場所を最初に発見したのか…誰もこの場所に関わりたくなかったのか、どっちなのかしらね」
languages.original_text: "How very peculiar, shereen. The palace is ruined, and still all of the valuables are sitting exactly where they should be. Either we are the first to discover this place, or... nobody wanted anything to do with it."

traits.locale_text: 「なんて不気味なのかしら、シャリーン。宮廷は廃墟になってるのに、貴重品はすべてあるべき場所に置かれたまま。あたしたちがこの場所を最初に発見したのか…誰もこの場所に関わりたくなかったのか、どっちなのかしらね」

languages.text: «Es algo singular, shereen. El palacio está en ruinas, pero todos los objetos de valor siguen en su sitio. O somos los primeros que descubren este lugar, o... nadie quería ni acercarse a él».
languages.original_text: "How very peculiar, shereen. The palace is ruined, and still all of the valuables are sitting exactly where they should be. Either we are the first to discover this place, or... nobody wanted anything to do with it."

traits.locale_text: «Es algo singular, shereen. El palacio está en ruinas, pero todos los objetos de valor siguen en su sitio. O somos los primeros que descubren este lugar, o... nadie quería ni acercarse a él».

languages.text: “这太诡异了，亲爱的。宫殿已经完全荒废，但所有的宝物都好好地留在原地。要么，我们是第一批发现它的人，要么……就是没有人想和这个地方扯上关系。”
languages.original_text: "How very peculiar, shereen. The palace is ruined, and still all of the valuables are sitting exactly where they should be. Either we are the first to discover this place, or... nobody wanted anything to do with it."

traits.locale_text: “这太诡异了，亲爱的。宫殿已经完全荒废，但所有的宝物都好好地留在原地。要么，我们是第一批发现它的人，要么……就是没有人想和这个地方扯上关系。”

languages.text: « C'est vraiment très intrigant, shereen. Ce palais est en ruine et pourtant, tous les objets de valeur sont encore parfaitement à leur place. Soit nous sommes les premiers à découvrir cet endroit, soit... personne ne voulait s'en approcher avant nous. »
languages.original_text: "How very peculiar, shereen. The palace is ruined, and still all of the valuables are sitting exactly where they should be. Either we are the first to discover this place, or... nobody wanted anything to do with it."

traits.locale_text: « C'est vraiment très intrigant, shereen. Ce palais est en ruine et pourtant, tous les objets de valeur sont encore parfaitement à leur place. Soit nous sommes les premiers à découvrir cet endroit, soit... personne ne voulait s'en approcher avant nous. »

languages.text: "Wie höchst eigenartig, Shereen. Der Palast ist zerstört, und dennoch befinden sich alle Wertgegenstände genau dort, wo sie sein sollten. Entweder haben wir dieses Gebäude als Erstes entdeckt oder ... niemand wollte etwas damit zu tun haben."
languages.original_text: "How very peculiar, shereen. The palace is ruined, and still all of the valuables are sitting exactly where they should be. Either we are the first to discover this place, or... nobody wanted anything to do with it."

traits.locale_text: "Wie höchst eigenartig, Shereen. Der Palast ist zerstört, und dennoch befinden sich alle Wertgegenstände genau dort, wo sie sein sollten. Entweder haben wir dieses Gebäude als Erstes entdeckt oder ... niemand wollte etwas damit zu tun haben."

languages.text: "Ne acayip şirinim. Saray mahvolmuş durumda olsa da değerli tüm mallar yerli yerinde. Ya burayı ilk biz keşfetmişiz ya da... Kimse buraya adımını atmak istememiş."
languages.original_text: "How very peculiar, shereen. The palace is ruined, and still all of the valuables are sitting exactly where they should be. Either we are the first to discover this place, or... nobody wanted anything to do with it."
